Conjuration 3

Sounder of Boars

EA Marverni

Ritual
N1H1
spell id [id]: 206
effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 1807
number of effects [nreff]: 20
gems required [gemcost]: 20N
Summon Units:#1807 Great Boar x 20
The caster, often a Gutuater, summons a sounder of Great Boars. Great Boars are almost as heavy as an ox and are sacred to the people of Marverni.
